Group hierarchy:
I removed the provision in RDS, and the db.m5.2xlarge is too much for system so I changed to db.m5.large, those changes reduce the DB cost from 2529$ to 570$ monthly.
For the EC2 instance, I changed from On Demand to 1 year Convertible Reserved Instances and the intances cost decrease from 4098$ to 3023$.
